senses.sense_definition: A medical condition characterized by tonic spasms of the muscles in the extremities, such as the hands and feet.

examples.text: The neurologist diagnosed the patient with <w>acromyotonus</w> after observing the persistent stiffness in her fingers.
Although rare, <w>acromyotonus</w> can significantly impair fine motor skills due to involuntary muscle contractions.
